name: HP
desc: Hit points. The unit is removed from the battle if HP reaches 0.

name: Dex
desc: Dexterity. Determines hit rate, critical rate, and critical avoid.

name: Spd
desc: Speed. A unit can attack twice if its speed is 4 higher than the opponent's.

name: Con
desc: Constitution. Affects how well the unit can wield heavier weapons and resists stagger.

name: Mov
desc: The distance you can move in one turn.
